body:
![WAPW](http://cl.ly/image/070H3N2z2s2e/download/ic_launcher.png)

Hello guys, i have good news for the android users! Many of you asked me how to extract WhatsApp password from Android devices. @GitsUp has coded an .apk based on my code released here #895 and also you can find it in my [website](https://mgp25.com).

**Things i need to update (TODO list):**
- Extract identity ( I'm on the way people :p )
- Log useful http requests

**Useful information:**
I made a wiki in where i am explaining advanced stuff on reverse engineering WhatsApp and stuff (tokens, http requests, etc...) [WA Wiki!](http://wa.mgp25.com)

**How to contact me?**
Twitter: @_mgp25
Mail: me [ at ] mgp25.com

[**Download:**](https://mgp25.com/wa/wapw2.apk) wapw2.apk
**SHA1:** CA465128E4C4B4A4F70B37E968F62C302AA8A3E1
**MD5:** DB753933E47926DD131B097E069DB1D4

**Requirements**

You need your device to be rooted. If you don't know how to root your device, search in google :)

**How to use it?**

Easy! Follow this steps:

1. Open WA PW

![wapw](http://cl.ly/image/2G1p0h2K033b/SC20140925-005038.png)

2. Click on 'Extract pw!' and give root privileges to the apk

![root](http://cl.ly/image/2J1t1t121C1x/SC20140925-005047.png)

3. Now you have your WA PW!

![pw](http://cl.ly/image/020s0Y0V2i1Z/SC20140925-005055.png)

4. You can send it to your computer via WhatsApp, email...

![ta-chan](http://cl.ly/image/3o1V3A2k212e/SC20140925-005101.png)

**How it works?**

Is explained in #895 and also was explained in Yowsup repository.

**Me or pw file not found?**

You need to have an active number in your WhatsApp (Device)

**Additional info**

You can hook classes from WhatsApp to get data, like:

App$me.java

```java
package com.whatsapp;

import java.io.Serializable;

public class App$Me
  implements Serializable
{
  private static final long serialVersionUID = -1952119322404952662L;
  public String cc;
  public String jabber_id;
  public String number;

  App$Me(String paramString1, String paramString2)
  {
    this.cc = paramString1;
    this.number = paramString2;
    this.jabber_id = null;
  }
}
```

And [zw.java](http://cl.ly/code/3Z1Q050M1w1M)

This files as examples :p


**HEY! I'm an iPhone users!**

Don't worry! You can use [this utility](https://github.com/mgp25/WA-password-extractor) i made!

title: Extract WA password from device [Android users]
